Canlis, Short Documentary Film (2017)

After launching their new website, the Canlis brothers came to me with a wild idea they'd concocted to congratulate their close friend, Will Guidara, who's restaurant, Eleven Madison Park, was just named #1 in the world.

With only a few weeks notice, I accepted the challenge of making a film almost entirely alone and in a compressed time period of just 12 days. The opportunity was huge. The over 4,000 mile road trip included meeting with some of the most influential chefs and restauranteurs in the country. We carried a 24 year old barrel of whiskey from one end coast to another, sharing a bit with each guest as they toasted to the future of Eleven Madison Park and it's owners.

I said on "day one" that if, in the end, all we did was make the staff cry, I'd be happy. We did that and so much more.

Streaming version releasing publicly, Sept 1st.

Watch the film
